column2: BEYOND THE WALL A raiding party consisting of JON SNOW, TORMUND, GENDRY BRATHEON, JORAH MORMONT, SANDOR CLEGANE, BERIC DONDARRIAN, THOROS of MYR and several Wildlings are ranging beyond the wall of Eastwatch-by-the-Sea
Are you all right? GENDRY faces JON and grunts
Beautiful, eh? I can breath again
You've never been down south
I've been to Winterfell
That's the north
There's not another woman within 100 miles of here
We have to make due with what we've got
This one is maybe not so smart
Davos says he is a strong fighter
Good
Smart people don't come up here looking for the dead

column1: So, you met this Dragon Queen, huh? And? JON
column2: She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee
You spent too much time with the free folk and now you don't like kneeling
Priestess
We're fighting a great war
I wanted to be one of you

column1: Do you know what she did to me? She strapped me down on a bed, she stripped me naked -- SANDOR
column2: Sounds all right so far
-- and put leeches on me
Yes
It could have been worse
She wanted to kill me
Your lips are moving and you're complaining about something
This one's been killed six times
Good lad
The first time I went north of the wall was with your father
He was a good man

column1: Were you with him at the end? JON
column2: I was a prisoner of the Wildlings
I can't think of a worse way for him to go
I hate that he died that way
Your father wanted to execute me
I heard
He was in the right of course
I'm glad he didn't capture you
Me too
Your father gave me this sword
Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros
But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries
He gave it to you
I'm not his son
I brought shame to my house
I forfeited the right to claim this sword
WINTERFELL - COURTYARD Snow is falling into the courtyard
Father used to watch us from up here
I remember
One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick
I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me
What? ARYA retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it
That's your pretty handwriting

column1: Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt -- SANSA
column2: You don't have to read it
\Father has been charged with treason"
They forced me to do it
Did they

column1: With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop? SANSA
column2: You don't know what it was like
So was I
They told me it was the only way to save father
And you were stupid enough to believe them
But you didn't
I didn't betray him
You should be on your knees thanking me

column1: The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world? ARYA
column2: I was training
Training
Oh, I don't know about that
You never would have survived what I survived
I guess we'll never know
What are you doing to do with that letter
I don't know yet
Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants

column1: This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart -- ARYA
column2: The northern lords will read it

column1: Are you going to say, \But I was just a child\"? SANSA"
column2: You're angry
Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things
- BEYOND THE WALL The raiding party are marching single file acorss the frozen tundra
You're one big ugly dog
Fuck off
They told me you were mean

column1: Were you born mean or you just hate Wildlings? SANDOR
column2: I don't give two shits about Wildlings
Gingers I hate
Gingers are beautiful
Don't point your fucking finger at me
Ever since you've been mean
Ah
I bet you do
Nope
Brienne of Tarth
How does she look at you? Like she wants to carve you up and eat your liver? TORMUND nods
You do know her
We've met
I want to make babies with her
You don't much look like him
I serve the north
The north didn't raise you from the dead
The lord of light never spoke to me
He wants you alive
That's all anyone can tell me, I don't know
I think about that all the time
But we all die
The enemy always wins
\I am the shield that guards the realms of men"
Maybe we don't need to understand any more than that
Aye
That's what I saw in the fire
A mountain like an arrowhead
Are you sure? SANDOR turns to THOROS and nods his head
We're getting close
DRAGONSTONE - CHAMBER OF THE PAINTED TABLE TYRION is sitting in a chair staring into the fire
Do you know what I like about you? TYRION turns to look at DAENERYS
I honestly don't
You're not a hero
Oh
I once charged through the mud gate of King's Landing
I don't want you to be a hero
It's interesting these heroes you name
Jon Snow's not in love with me
Oh, my mistake

column1: Season 7 – Episode 6 – Beyond the Wall From HBO
column2: Jon and the Brotherhood hunt the dead
